Agreement-Name: Adobe
Agreement-FCC: adbe

Title: PUA Use in the Adobe Glyph List
Author: SIL International
Publication-Date: 2002-09-20
URL: http://scripts.sil.org/PUAinAdobeGlyphList
Access-Date: 2014-07-05

Title: Adobe Standard Cyrillic Font Specification, Technical Note #5013
Author: Adobe Developer Support, Adobe Systems Incorporated
Publication-Date: 1998-02-18
URL: http://www.adobe.com/content/dam/Adobe/en/devnet/font/pdfs/5013.Cyrillic_Font_Spec.pdf
Access-Date: 2014-07-05

Author: Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2014-07-05
URL: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrillic_script
Access-Date: 2014-07-05

Title: Serbian Cyrillic Letters BE, GHE, DE, PE, TE
Author: Janko Stamenovic
Publication-Date: 2000-01-17
URL: http://jankojs.tripod.com/SerbianCyr.htm
Access-Date: 2014-07-05

Title: "Indonesian rupiah." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia.
Author: Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2014-07-02
URL: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesian_rupiah
Access-Date: 2014-07-05

Title: Registry of Apple use of Unicode corporate-zone characters.

Publication-Date: 2005-04-04
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/CORPCHAR.TXT

Publication-Date: 2005-04-05
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/SYMBOL.TXT
